content:
@Dan Gohman Hi! I have a couple of PRs for Origin - #169 (switching to stable #[naked]) and #170 (adding PowerPC64 and MIPS support). #169 has some review comments from @bjorn3 which I've addressed. Just
wondering if there's anything else needed or if they're ready to merge. Thanks!
I've seen that you've accepted the #169, thanks. What about the #170? Should I contact someone like @bjorn3 to have a look at it?
It is @Dan Gohman's repo. I don't have write permissions to it.
I've reviewed the second PR now. Thanks for the PR!

@Dan Gohman hi. If you happen to have a few moments for checking out Origin commit #170 it'd help me a lot. Thanks!

Add powerpc64 and mips32 architecture support by walruscraft 路 Pull Request #170 路 sunfishcode/origin
This adds startup code for powerpc64le (ELF v2 ABI) and mipsel (O32 ABI). Two new arch modules: powerpc64.rs and mips32.rs. Each one has the usual set: entry point, trap(), dynamic_table_addr(), re...
Hi, @Dan Gohman. Kindly note the follow-up PR #171. Thanks.
